resources.string: Modify the color of the %dth finger pressed
If Shizuku seems to be not installed or activated, you need to install and activate it successfully before proceeding to the next step.
Shizuku is running. After clicking the [Start] button below, it will display the location you touch. (Permission needs to be requested from Shizuku for the first time use)

This program will use the /data/local/tmp/show.taps/ directory. Please do not store files or perform other operations in this directory.
Since this function requires the use of Android's unpublished APIs, compatibility with all devices cannot be guaranteed. If touch failure or other malfunctions occur, please restart by long-pressing the power button and uninstall the software, or uninstall the software using the adb command (adb uninstall show.taps).
Currently, there are known compatibility issues with HUAWEI, HONOR, and multi-screen devices.
This app does not automatically check for updates. Below are links related to me. Click to jump, long press to copy.
Go to Play Store for details, updates, or reviews
Please check if Shizuku has been launched~

The current version is only available for users in mainland China. Please download from Google Play!
The Shizuku version you currently have installed is too low, please download the new version!
Please open Shizuku and check this app in the authorization list!\nIf you can\'t find this app in Shizuku\'s authorization list, please close Shizuku from recent tasks and reopen it.
